::Battera::
She looked at Vulois. "Would you like the memory transfer? That will 
restore your past to you."  She pulled the linterlink from the back 
of her head. "If you want me to, I can do this. but we must hurry. I 
fear that there are those who may not want you to know who you are."



KitKat::
She worked feverously over both projects.  She went from Phobia's 
baby to working on Megatron's clone spark.  She finished with the 
baby and set it in a stasis chamber.  She hoped that the baby would 
give her more info on the temperal rift.  Next she worked on the 
spark.  She put it into the replicator and set the   replicator on 
generate.  She hoped it would start to create a perfect clone of 
Megatron.  Now that she had that done with, she turned to Starscream.
"I understand your fears.  And I agree with you, to a point.  I shall 
make you my war general.  Destructor shall be my strategic advisor.  
You shall accompany me in my next meeting. But for now, I have to 
work on this."  She looked at him and smiled.  "Yes, I do believe I 
have made the right choice, making you my advisor.  I trust that you 
will help guide me to do the right thing." She smiled again and then 
went back to looking at her console, working on the cloning.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois slowly lowered his weapon, and looked strangely at Battera 
and 
> Cybershark.
> 
> "The past? What do you mean? Haven't I always been with the 
Alliance, 
> and who are you, sharky? Don't remember seeing you before."
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Starscream
> 
> Starscream brought the spark over to KitKat, still with a worried 
> look on his face.
> 
> "All the same, I have a request. Make me the thirs member of this 
> council, as a military adviser. I would leave most of the decision 
> making to all of you, I just want to be able to keep a close eye on 
> Arachnia."
